Project #3: Rotating Navigation
Click on the hamburger Menu

Amateur Traveller #615
By: Alejo Lagos

A few years ago, I did an interview on the amateur traveller podcast (by Chris Christensen), where I recommended a two-week itinerary through some beautiful and not so famous Colombian sights.

If you are interested in Latin American culture, Colombia it’s one of the best places to go because it’s still relatively undiscovered by international tourism. You’ll get a more authentic experience in my opinion.

Itinerary Summary
